projects.title: PHP Website Development
projects.details: Developed a dynamic website using PHP, MySQL, and Laravel framework. Implemented user authentication, database operations, and responsive front-end design.

projects.title: Figma UI Design
projects.details: Created high-fidelity UI designs for a mobile application using Figma. Collaborated with the development team to ensure design feasibility and consistency.

projects.title: Adobe XD Prototype
projects.details: Designed and prototyped a web application using Adobe XD. Conducted user testing sessions to gather feedback and iteratively improve the user experience.

projects.title: React SPA Development
projects.details: Built a single-page application (SPA) using React.js. Implemented state management with Redux and integrated with external APIs for data fetching.

projects.title: JavaScript Game Development
projects.details: Developed a 2D platformer game using vanilla JavaScript and HTML5 Canvas. Implemented game mechanics, animations, and level design.

projects.title: Node.js API Development
projects.details: Created RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express.js framework. Integrated with MongoDB for data storage and implemented authentication and authorization.

projects.title: Responsive CSS Layout
projects.details: Designed and implemented a responsive website layout using CSS Flexbox and Grid. Ensured cross-browser compatibility and optimized for various screen sizes.
